item.title: Cisco ACI â€“ Reboot an APIC
item.description: As i had some struggle to find the right command, i will share it here ðŸ™‚ 1 2 3 4 5 admin@aci-lab-apic01:~> acidiag reboot Broadcast message from root@aci-lab-apic01 (unknown) at 15:31 ... The system is going down for reboot NOW! So be ready, there is no warning/confirmation!
